statusDto.name: Backordered
statusDto.description: Some or all of the items in the order are not in stock and are awaiting replenishment

statusDto.name: Shipped
statusDto.description: The order has been dispatched from the warehouse and is on its way to the customer. Tracking information is usually provided to the customer at this stage.

statusDto.name: Paid
statusDto.description: Payment has been successfully received and processed for the order.

statusDto.name: Delivered
statusDto.description: The order has been successfully delivered to the customer.

statusDto.name: Completed
statusDto.description: The order is completed. This status is used once all aspects of the sale are finalized, including delivery, payment, and customer satisfaction

statusDto.name: On Hold
statusDto.description: The order has been put on hold. This can be due to various reasons such as customer request, stock issues, or payment problems.

statusDto.name: Returned
statusDto.description: The customer has returned the order. This status is applied once the returned item(s) have been received back from the customer.

statusDto.name: Confirmed
statusDto.description: The order has been confirmed, indicating that initial validations (like stock check and payment verification) have passed

statusDto.name: Cancelled
statusDto.description: The order has been cancelled. This can happen by customer request, or if there are issues with payment or stock that cannot be resolved.

statusDto.name: Failed
statusDto.description: The order could not be processed due to a failure in payment or other critical issues.

statusDto.name: Refunded
statusDto.description: The customer has been refunded for their order. This can follow a return or a cancellation where payment had been processed.

statusDto.name: Pending
statusDto.description: The order has been created but is awaiting further action, such as payment confirmation or manual review.

statusDto.name: Out for Delivery
statusDto.description: The order is with the delivery service and will be delivered to the customer soon.

statusDto.name: Processing
statusDto.description: The order is being prepared for shipment. This can involve picking the items from the warehouse, packaging, and labeling.
